Posts.Content: I hope I am on the cancer forum that Dd referred me to, I did not realize whatever day ago that this iPhone can run multiple programs at once, so can my laptop but they are on different tabs, thus making me a jackass to two good people when I replied to the Wrong person (capitalization is mine). Anyway.... What is a Gleason score and what do the numbers mean? All I was told was "prostate cancer not in the prostate, stage 4, terminal."
Posts.Title: Question!
